title: Match same products from two different online shops
description:
Provide two datasets with products from each online store or a single dataset containing products from both stores.
To try out the matcher, just click ▷ Start . If you need any guidance, just follow this tutorial.

dataset1_ids.sectionCaption: Separate datasets (fill if you have a separate dataset or datasets for each online shop)
dataset1_ids.title: Dataset IDs from shop 1 (if applicable)
dataset1_ids.description: IDs of datasets containing information about products from the first shop.

dataset2_ids.title: Dataset IDs from shop 2 (if applicable)
dataset2_ids.description: IDs of datasets containing information about products from the second shop.

pair_dataset_ids.sectionCaption: Pair datasets (fill if you have a dataset or datasets of product pairs)
pair_dataset_ids.title: Pair dataset IDs (will take precedence if filled)
pair_dataset_ids.description: IDs of datasets where each row contains information about a pair of products you want to match.

input_mapping.title: Input attributes mapping
input_mapping.description: A mapping object specifying which attributes from the data you provided correspond to attributes used by the Product Mapping model. For details see https://apify.com/Equidem/ai-product-matcher#how-to-specify-the-input-datasets

output_mapping.title: Output attributes mapping
output_mapping.description: A mapping object specifying which attributes from the data you provided should be in the output dataset and under what attribute names. For details see https://apify.com/Equidem/ai-product-matcher#how-to-specify-the-output-dataset-format

precision_recall.title: Precision/recall tradeoff
precision_recall.description: Specify whether you care more about precision or recall. For explanation, see https://apify.com/Equidem/ai-product-matcher#precisionrecall-tradeoff
